about_the_game:
We Were Here Together is a first-person cooperative puzzle adventure set in and around a mysterious castle in Antarctica. The game is the third entry in the We Were Here series. It’s all about cooperative discovery, puzzle solving, and immersion. Working together with a partner, you must solve puzzles via careful observation and smart communication. When you find yourself trapped in different parts of the sinister Castle Rock, you will only have your walkie-talkies and your wits to figure out how to escape…

The incredible support from our fans has been central in our journey from student team with We Were Here to the release of We Were Here Too, and We Were Here Together. This special Supporter Edition DLC is a way for you to show your support for our personal brand of cooperative adventure games!

As a token of our gratitude, we offer the following with this special Supporter Edition…

We Were Here Together Supporter Edition includes:

  • Special Supporter borders – Enjoy cosmetic borders around your in-game profile and hosted games in the menu to show off how awesome and supportive you are!
  • Exclusive Supporter Walkie-Talkie skin - Solve challenges in style with a unique supporter cosmetic skin for your in-game walkie-talkie!
  • Mobile and Desktop Backgrounds - 1920 by 1080 desktop backgrounds and 852 by 1608 backgrounds for mobile use.
  • The Official We Were Here Together Soundtrack - Enjoy 59 minutes of thrills and suspense, composed by Leon van der Stel.
      Track list:
    • Main Theme
    • The Signal
    • Frozen in Time
    • A Land Long Lost
    • Halls of the Enlightened
    • Sacred Hymn
    • Eye of the Storm
    • In the Dark
    • Buried Knowledge
    • Trouble Brewing
    • Overgrown Legacy
    • Reflections of the Mind
    • The Soulstone
    • Behind the Mask
    • Waltz of the Wicked
